tool_description: A RESTful API to get latest foreign exchange prices in major Egyptian Banks.
name: EGYPT FX
title: EGYPT FX

api_list.name: Get FX Rates for a bank
api_list.description: Use this Endpoint to get list of currencies and rates for a certain bank

required_parameters.name: bank_code
required_parameters.description: Bank Codes abbreviations of the bank name for a full list go to :  https://gist.github.com/amrfarid140/bd65a40f101cda713716930135b82304

api_list.name: Get currency rates in a specific bank
api_list.description: Get Buy and Sell rates for a single currency for a specific bank

required_parameters.name: bank_code
required_parameters.description: Bank Codes abbreviations of the bank name for a full list go to :  https://gist.github.com/amrfarid140/bd65a40f101cda713716930135b82304

required_parameters.name: currency_code
required_parameters.description: Example for Currency codes are : USD,EGP,EUR and so on
